Summary - Product management leader responsible for overseeing all aspects of the product lifecycle related to the entire Act! platform: Act! Companion (native mobile app), Act! Insight (analytics engine), Act! Contact Link (Outlook plug-in), Act! API, Act! Subscription Platform, Ask Act! an Amazon Alexa integration and the Act! technology stack. Duties - - Define product vision, roadmap and strategy- Ensure that product strategy aligns to overall business strategy- Gather feedback from customers and partners- Maintain strong product relationship with user base- Run alpha and beta programs- Product steward for all things user experience and strategy- Manage competitive analysis intake- Product evangelist company and customer-wide- Manage cross-functional teams- Run quantitative analysis for purposes of product growth (using Adv. Statistical Methods and Data Science)- Wireframing and graphic design- Educate internal and external stakeholders on product
Member of Board of Directors & Chief Operations Officer

Sowing Resilience Communities promotes housing and care for individuals requiring living, nurturing and healthcare support. Our goal is to ensure that individuals live independently in healthy environments. Currently, many households across the US, lack the resources to provide and reside in environments that lead to positive health. We aim to reduce the need for poor health and eating habits, and keep people from falling back into a recycled system of prescription drug treatment. On top of the housing and healthcare services, we will also be training and providing job education for individuals in these living situations. Part of our program to help people back on their feet is supplying them with housing, by providing small, modular homes where medical professionals and our care team will check in with guests. Our organization plans to spend all of its time and resources to keep these resources operational, making sure that there is always a healthy home for those needing help. Our services will be available without charge to all individuals from the public who can benefit from the program and regain their health and independence. Sowing Resilience Communities is a not for profit organization, 501(c)3, and will maintain funding through individual donations and grants. If you are interested in learning more, or know someone who could benefit from a service like this, please reach out!

Product Manager, Infor CRM
January 29, 2015, Kevin worked with Jeff in the same group

Kevin and I served on the Product Management team for Infor CRM and Saleslogix (when it was owned by Swiftpage) tasked with creating highly innovative, functional CRM solutions to help drive user adoption, and create a strong, integrated platform for customers.  Kevin is a great leader of cross-functional teams, and on top of that a strategic problem solver.  Although not directly involved on the project, I witnessed as Kevin managed the ION integration team (between Infor CRM and Infor) to get to a strong coupling of the products, and adding our CRM product to the large Infor product suite.  Kevin has shown strong skills in his ability to manage cross-functional teams, but also teams that stretch across the globe.  He has a keen eye for what is right for the customer, and willing to work with all parties to come to the best solution.  Kevin is a top-notch product manager, and a strong businessperson who could help any team or situation!

summary: I'm a seasoned product & technology leader and strategist. I'm an expert in business strategy and strategic planning, product management, product development, purpose-driven applications and analytics. As a product management leader at Act!, I have helped launch two brand new applications in the core platform, which I manage, driving the growth of the Act! subscription benefits while cutting overhead costs. I consistently demonstrate my abilities in research and development expertise and strong commercial acumen. I've worn many hats in my career, including: salesman, customer service leader, product manager, developer, data scientist, executive leader and operations manager. As a result of this experience, I am able to demonstrate time and time again the ability to lead teams to success. I am able to handle multi-disciplinary tasks, cross-functional projects and unique problems alike. I don't flinch or buckle under the pressure. All that said, actual experience has taught me that:- I've been directing product teams through several key technology revolutions: mobile, social and data- I'm multi-lingual in technology-driven business: can easily talk and architect with developers, discuss testing with QA, talk launch plans with marketing and pitch alongside sales teams while talking strategy and long-term plans with executives- I have BIG ideas- I don't care who gets credit, I just want my team to win- Ideas are great, execution is what matters. I execute.- If the left and right brain were hands, I'd be ambidextrous- I'm always calm, collected and calculated- I am the one to run into the fire to helpI love connecting with like-minded individuals, so feel free to reach out and connect.Specialties: product management, product development, AGILE, SaaS, data analytics, business development, strategy, entrepreneurship, financial and operations management
